Using Synthea in Productions

Synthea is free to use without restriction.

If you think Synthea is right for your live production but have any questions, I'm happy to discuss. Send me an email at synthea@anthonyvanwinkle.com.

Feedback

If you've used Synthea for a production, I would love to hear about it! Please send a production link, photos, and/or your thoughts on Synthea to synthea@anthonyvanwinkle.com and let me know how it went!

Source Code

The complete list of features and functions available (and in-development) for Synthea can be found in the source code documentation, which also reveal the inner-workings of the software.

Synthea is an open-source project, meaning anyone can download the source code to examine, modify, and build their own version of the software. More details are available at the Synthea repository.
